## Public Member Functions

### canUseAsEpilogue() {#aad1b2b97b144a3f9defffbc09bedfbb0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool Thumb1FrameLowering::canUseAsEpilogue (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> whether or not the given <code>MBB</code> can be used as a epilogue for the target.

The epilogue will be inserted before the first terminator of that block. This method is used by the shrink-wrapping pass to decide if <code>MBB</code> will be correctly handled by the target.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-h/#l00050">50</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-h">Thumb1FrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-cpp/#l00601">601</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-cpp">Thumb1FrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### eliminateCallFramePseudoInstr() {#a03870219d36d778b50b9d2b1a5f775c7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineBasicBlock::iterator Thumb1FrameLowering::eliminateCallFramePseudoInstr (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method is called during prolog/epilog code insertion to eliminate call frame setup and destroy pseudo instructions (but only if the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> is using them).

It is responsible for eliminating these instructions, replacing them with concrete instructions. This method need only be implemented if using call frame setup/destroy pseudo instructions. Returns an iterator pointing to the instruction after the replaced one.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-h/#l00041">41</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-h">Thumb1FrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-cpp/#l00116">116</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-cpp">Thumb1FrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### hasReservedCallFrame() {#ab6578ac15aab22a10a00e231e45ff9cb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool Thumb1FrameLowering::hasReservedCallFrame (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
hasReservedCallFrame - Under normal circumstances, when a frame pointer is not required, we reserve argument space for call sites in the function immediately on entry to the current function.

This eliminates the need for add/sub sp brackets around call sites. Returns true if the call frame is included as part of the stack frame.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-h">Thumb1FrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-cpp/#l00053">53</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-cpp">Thumb1FrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### restoreCalleeSavedRegisters() {#adca65a5406a289a41bd58993e28bb3aa}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool Thumb1FrameLowering::restoreCalleeSavedRegisters (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calleesavedinfo">CalleeSavedInfo</a> &gt; CSI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42; TRI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
restoreCalleeSavedRegisters - Issues instruction(s) to restore all callee saved registers and returns true if it isn&#39;t possible / profitable to do so by issuing a series of load instructions via loadRegToStackSlot().

If it returns true, and any of the registers in CSI is not restored, it sets the corresponding Restored flag in CSI to false. Returns false otherwise.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-h/#l00033">33</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-h">Thumb1FrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-cpp/#l01188">1188</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-cpp">Thumb1FrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### spillCalleeSavedRegisters() {#af07ce77a4beea41a98862690cee5ec2d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool Thumb1FrameLowering::spillCalleeSavedRegisters (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calleesavedinfo">CalleeSavedInfo</a> &gt; CSI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42; TRI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
spillCalleeSavedRegisters - Issues instruction(s) to spill all callee saved registers and returns true if it isn&#39;t possible / profitable to do so by issuing a series of store instructions via storeRegToStackSlot().

Returns false otherwise.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-h/#l00028">28</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-h">Thumb1FrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-cpp/#l01100">1100</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-cpp">Thumb1FrameLowering.cpp</a>.

## Private Member Functions

### emitPopSpecialFixUp() {#a26b85ea3343b31131114999fcfc500db}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool Thumb1FrameLowering::emitPopSpecialFixUp (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, bool DoIt) const</>}>
Emit the special fixup code sequence for the epilogue.

<SectionUser title="See Also">
needPopSpecialFixUp <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#a4cfc8b177e8521a4b496ae2edff6244f">for</a> more <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/details">details</a>. <code>DoIt</code>, tells this method whether or not to actually insert the code sequence in <code><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a></code>. I.e., when <code>DoIt</code> is <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/false">false</a>, <code><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a></code> is left untouched.
</SectionUser>


<SectionUser title="Returns">
For <code>DoIt</code> == true: True when the emission succeeded false otherwise. For <code>DoIt</code> == false: True when the emission would have been possible, false otherwise.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-h/#l00084">84</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-h">Thumb1FrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-cpp/#l00643">643</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-cpp">Thumb1FrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### needPopSpecialFixUp() {#a01911078879063d3a0252add682f5b1a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool Thumb1FrameLowering::needPopSpecialFixUp (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF) const</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> if the frame lowering of <code>MF</code> needs a special fixup code sequence for the epilogue.

Unlike T2 and <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm">ARM</a> mode, the T1 pop instruction cannot restore to LR, and we can&#39;t pop the value directly to the PC when we need to update the SP after popping the value. So instead we have to emit: POP &#123;r3&#125; ADD sp, #offset BX r3 If this would clobber a return value, then generate this sequence instead: MOV ip, r3 POP &#123;r3&#125; ADD sp, #offset MOV lr, r3 MOV r3, ip BX lr

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-h/#l00074">74</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-h">Thumb1FrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-cpp/#l00609">609</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb1framelowering-cpp">Thumb1FrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
